Sentencas: Composite Ni-SDC (Samaria doped Ceria) cathodes are able to operate in strong reducing atmospheres for steam electrolysis, and composite cathodes based on redox-stable La0.4Sr0.4TiO3 (LSTO) have demonstrated promising performances without the reducing gas flow.
Titulo: Composite cathode La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-δ-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ impregnated with Ni for high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: However, the electro-catalytic activity of cathodes based on LSTO is insufficient for the efficient electrochemical reduction of steam or carbon oxide.
Titulo: Composite cathode La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-δ-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ impregnated with Ni for high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: In this work, catalytic-active Ni nanoparticles were loaded on a La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-delta -Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta cathode (Ni-loaded LSTO-SDC) via an impregnation method to improve the electrode performances for direct steam electrolysis.
Titulo: Composite cathode La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-δ-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ impregnated with Ni for high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The synergetic effect of catalytically-active Ni nanoparticles and the redox-stable LSTO-SDC skeleton contributed to the improved performances and the excellent stability of the cathode for direct steam electrolysis.
Titulo: Composite cathode La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-δ-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ impregnated with Ni for high-temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The current efficiency with a Ni-loaded cathode was enhanced by 3% and 17% compared to the values with a bare LSTO-SDC cathode under 2.0 V of applied voltage at 800 degrees C with a flow of 3% H2O/5% H-2/Ar and 3% H2O/Ar to cathodes, respectively.
Titulo: Composite cathode La0.4Sr0.4TiO3-δ-Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ impregnated with Ni for high-temperature steam electrolysis
